pages.text: Shakin’ Margaritas &smashin’ burgers Welcome to our neighborhood burger joint, where our music sets the vibe before you even hit the door. Step inside and keep the good times rollin’ — we’re talkin’ fresh off the flat top smashburgers, Shorty Margaritas, and a crew that’s genuinely glad you’re here. Come one, come all - we can’t wait to serve ya! Downtown Charleston Learn more Daniel Island Learn more OUR MENU Pairs Best With Good PEOPLE This is the kind of food that just Smashburgers hot off the flat top, BLTs & Mahi sandwiches, Fried Chicken Salads, and House-Made Onion Rings built to pass around the table. . hits Our drink game’s strong too — Shorty Margaritas, neighborhood beers, easy wines, and zero-proof options that still bring the vibe. No fluff. No fuss. Just , cold drinks, and the kind of menu you’ll wanna run back to weekly. damn delicious food View Our Menu The Heavy’s vibe, anywhere you want it. Learn more JOIN OUR TEAM You can never have too much of a good thing — especially when it comes to people. If you're into team service, positive energy, and putting hospitality first, you're our kind of person. Heavy’s is a burger joint built with exceptional people, great food, and a killer playlist. Good vibes and good taste required. Apply Now HEAVY LISTENING Around here, we take two things seriously: great food and good music. really If you’re craving the Heavy’s vibe beyond the barstool, hit play on our Spotify playlist and tune into our playlist of the season. It’s sure to bring the energy wherever you are. Solid tunes, on tap. always Listen now

OUR MENU View our full food menu and drink selection - it’s full of all things you love, from our famous Barburger and Jumbo Wings to our Fresh Salads and Shorty Margarita. Menu offerings vary by location! Check your local Heavy’s for location-specific menu & pricing. For catering party trays, click here . Served with House-Made Jus for Dipping and The Wright Sauce. Topped with Cheddar & Jalapeños. ```html ``` hey, charleston neighbors! hey, charleston neighbors! hey, charleston neighbors! downtown charleston 1137 Morrison Dr, Charleston, SC 29403 (843) 212-3302 Hours: Open 11 am - 10 pm DailyHeavy's Hour: Weekdays 4 - 6 pm No Reservations - Just Come on In! Order Online Get Directions Our Menu Apply Now About Our Charleston Location Morrison Drive — The Original Heavy’s Barburger Tucked between Morrison Drive and Meeting Street, our first Heavy’s Barburger is where the neighborhood comes to hang. It’s all good vibes, cold drinks, and our delicious smashburgers that bring people together. Kick back in the dining room, catch the breeze on the front deck, or unwind on the patio with your four-legged partner while our playlist sets the vibe. Whether you’re rolling solo or rolling deep, this place just hits right. And take it from the locals — the Onion Ring Basket is a must for your table. join us forHeavy’s Hour Weekdays 4 - 6 pm $5 Shorty MargaritasNeighborhood Draft BeerGlass of House WineJack & CokeTito’s Vodka & Soda ORDER OUR FOR YOUR NEXT EVENT PARTY Trays Bring the flavor to your next event with Party Trays from Heavy’s. We’ve got trays of our hand-breaded Chicken Tenders, crispy Jumbo Wings, freshly tossed Company Salad, and Bacon & Eggs tray (aka Viv’s Deviled Eggs). Plus, a whole Lemon Lime Icebox Pie! Perfect for Holidays, Beach Days, Boat Days, and . all the days Available for pick-up only. Learn More
